message: Hey folks, fantastic job you're doing so far! Just happened upon this project and I would love to lend a hand, If there's room.  I have several years of exp. in game development for places like Turn10 (Forza motorsports 2), Buzz Monkey (Tony Hawk Shred), and Pipeworks (too many to list).  The Myst series was a huge favorite of mine, back in the day.  It would be a pleasure to help bring some of those memories back.  I also have Unity development exp.  lemme know.

Hey, can you shoot me an email at zib@starryexpanse.com? We prefer to do recruitment sort of stuff in a less public setting :) Same goes for anybody interested in helping out, send me an e-mail explaining what you can do to help, and (if you can) provide some examples of past work, so we can figure how whether or not we can use you at the moment.
email sent.  My stuff is woefully outdated.
Wow, it's quiet here... and BuddhaMaster is always online...
